title: [Large-Scale] Mentoring-Based Internship Education Design for Strengthening Adult Civic Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social activity experience and digital device usage proficiency
context.additional_context: Emphasis on learner-led activities and actual project implementation for solving community issues

learning_goals: Learners complete one community problem-solving project utilizing a mentor-mentee collaboration system.
Learners evaluate their professional development and adaptive abilities with at least 80% satisfaction through weekly reflective journals.
Learners improve project deliverables at least twice by applying feedback routines.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
